title: Finding My Way Home
description: Can the loss of someone you love help you rediscover your life’s purpose? When Brenda loses her grandmother, she takes a look back at her life and realizes that she has lost track of what is important. To everyone else, including her boyfriend Joe, her life is more than perfect. But the three years of pretending are coming to an end and she has to face the consequences in order to keep a promise made to her grandmother. Noah is the family friend who stays true to himself and doesn’t let society dictate the course of his life. With his help, Brenda will embark on a journey mapped by her late grandmother and learn the meaning of friendship, happiness, and true love, finally finding her way home.
author: Alina Man
